019
020import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.component.ComponentBuilder;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.component.query.Query;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.component.query.QueryParameters;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.component.query.QueryResult;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.component.transaction.TransactionResult;
026
027import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
028
029/**
030 * QueryBuilder
031 *
032 * @author creatorfromhell
033 * @since 1.0.0.2
034 */
035public class QueryBuilder implements ComponentBuilder {
036
037  protected Query query;
038
039  public QueryBuilder() {
040
041  }
042
043  public QueryBuilder(final Query query) {
044
045    this.query = query;
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Creates a QueryBuilder instance with the provided query string.
050   *
051   * @param query the query string to create the QueryBuilder with
052   *
053   * @return a new QueryBuilder instance
054   */
055  public static QueryBuilder of(final String query) {
056
057    return new QueryBuilder(PluginCore.engine().queries().get(query));
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Adds the provided QueryParameters to the current query being built.
062   *
063   * @param parameters the QueryParameters to be added to the query
064   *
065   * @return a reference to this QueryBuilder instance
066   */
067  public QueryBuilder with(final QueryParameters parameters) {
068
069    query.with(parameters);
070    return this;
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * Sets the query for this QueryBuilder instance.
075   *
076   * @param query the query to be set for this QueryBuilder
077   *
078   * @return a reference to this QueryBuilder instance
079   */
080  public QueryBuilder with(final Query query) {
081
082    this.query = query;
083    return this;
084  }
085
086  /**
087   * Executes the query and returns the result synchronously.
088   *
089   * @return the result of executing the query
090   */
091  QueryResult execute() {
092
093    return query.execute();
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Asynchronously executes the transaction and sets the result in the provided CompletableFuture.
098   *
099   * @param result The CompletableFuture to hold the result of executing the transaction.
100   */
101  void execute(final CompletableFuture<TransactionResult> result) {
102
103    query.execute(result);
104  }
105
106  /**
107   * Returns the identifier of the component.
108   *
109   * @return the identifier of the component as a string.
110   */
111  @Override
112  public String identifier() {
113
114    return "query";
115  }
116
117  /**
118   * Returns a component builder instance that can be used to build components.
119   *
120   * @return a ComponentBuilder instance.
121   */
122  @Override
123  public ComponentBuilder builder() {
124
125    return new QueryBuilder();
126  }
127}
